Package eloquentelks.recommender.api.helper

Class FeatureCollectionAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • eloquentelks.recommender.api.helper.FeatureCollectionAccessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFeatureCollectionAccessor
    @Service
public class FeatureCollectionAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFeatureCollectionAccessor
    Provides convenient access to GeoJSON FeatureCollections and their Features and Properties as well.
